intents.description: Analyze NPS by region to understand regional satisfaction differences
Compare satisfaction across subscription plans to determine if enterprise customers are more satisfied than free/basic users
Analyze feature usage correlation with satisfaction to identify which features drive the highest satisfaction
Segment customers by tenure and analyze NPS to understand satisfaction profiles of long-term vs new customers
Identify at-risk customers based on low NPS and low purchase intent to assess retention risk

rationale: The analysis plan aims to provide actionable insights into customer satisfaction and retention, which are critical for improving product offerings and enhancing customer experience. By understanding the drivers of satisfaction and dissatisfaction across different segments, the company can prioritize areas for improvement and tailor strategies to retain customers. This plan will also help identify key features that influence satisfaction, allowing for targeted enhancements in the product roadmap.

suggested_segments.name: Promoters
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are highly likely to recommend (NPS 9-10)

suggested_segments.name: Detractors
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are unlikely to recommend (NPS 0-6)

suggested_segments.name: High Income Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers with high annual household income

suggested_segments.name: New Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers with tenure of less than 6 months

suggested_segments.name: Low Purchase Intent
suggested_segments.notes: Customers unlikely to purchase again (Purchase Intent 1-2)
